channel.title: Red Hat on Victor Toso
channel.description: Recent content in Red Hat on Victor Toso

item.title: Hello new life
item.description: Since the end of the Google Summer of Code 2014 so many things have happened that It is really hard to make a simple blog post about it… but I must try :) New job Well, along with the GSoC I’ve applied to a job at Red Hat and the process ended in August. Since October 15th I am part of the Spice team and I will be working at the Brno office in Czech Republic.
